item.title: Cannot start a new chat in Yahoo Messenger, mshtml.dll error
item.description: I was called today by a client today with a strange problem: yahoo messenger would error as soon as she wanted to start a new chat. The error quoted mshtml.dll as the source of the problems. Reinstalling Yahoo Messenger (which I previously suggested over the phone did not help). I don’t know exactly how this problem started but the fix is the following: go to the Microsoft Website and download 912945 (http://support.
